summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the Engineering Dept.; making appropriations from the Engineering Dept. Operating Fund and the Arterial City Street Fund for preliminary engineering activities for the proposed Duwamish Multi-Access Bicycle Trail; authorizing partial reimbursement to the Municipality of Metropolitan Seattle for inter-related surface restoration design cost of the Renton Effluent Transfer System construction; and increasing the expenditure allowance in the 1986 Budget of the Seattle Engineering Department therefor.
